products.name: Heated Stadium Seats for Bleachers with Back Support and Cushion, 3-Temperature Control & Timer Heating Bleacher Chairs, Comfort Stadium Chair Portable Bleacher Seat for Sports Events Outdoor
products.description: Experience Unparalleled Comfort: Feel the ultimate luxury on our heated seat cushion! The extra-thick back support makes every moment a delight. With a 4.5-inch thick high-elasticity foam padding and ergonomic design, it perfectly balances support and softness, giving you a comfortable experience in any setting. The cushion is foldable and comes with a shoulder strap, making it easy to carry and adding storage convenience to your comfort.     Stay Dry and Safe: The foldable heated stadium chair is made from durable 700D waterproof polyester fabric, providing excellent protection and long-lasting durability. No more worrying about getting wet or dirty! It’s designed to perform reliably in all weather conditions. The reinforced waterproof PVC bottom ensures you stay securely seated, offering both comfort and safety. (NOTE: Comes with fixed hooks. Simply pull them out from the zipper at the bottom and secure them under your seat.)     Smart Temperature Control & Timer Settings: The cushion offers three adjustable heat settings (Red: 65°C/149°F, Blue: 48°C/118°F, Green: 40°C/104°F), allowing you to easily switch between high, medium, and low heat levels with a simple press of a button. It also features a timer function with options for 15, 30, or 60-minute auto shut-off. If you prefer continuous heating, simply keep the indicator light off, and the cushion will stay in constant heat mode.     Find Your Perfect Angle: The heated seat comes with 6 adjustable angle settings, allowing you to easily find the ideal sitting position to suit your needs. Whether you're sitting upright to watch the game or reclining for a rest, you'll discover the perfect angle for maximum comfort. By evenly distributing body pressure, it effectively reduces discomfort in your back, neck, shoulders, and waist, helping you stay comfortable during long activities.     Versatile Use: The heated stadium seat is an excellent choice for football, baseball, basketball, the Olympics, the World Cup, and any other sports, as well as outdoor activities like camping, beach trips, and park visits. Ideal for anyone spending long hours in the stands, it provides a comfortable alternative to hard, cold seats. If you have any questions or need assistance with the product, please feel free to contact us.
